title: Tykr can reduce your risk while investing
description:
With inflation soaring and the stock market being volatile, you probably want some extra oversight in your investments, but you don’t have the time to manage your portfolio closely or the resources to pay an advisor. A smart option is to get a stock screening and education app like Tykr. It’s currently available for an extra $20 with code “STOCK” until June 11th. 

Tykr aims to take the guesswork out of investing by rigorously analyzing more than 30,000 US and international stocks. You can find any stock with a simple search and get an instant review based on Tykr’s open-source AI calculations. You’ll get a summary of the sale of whether it’s a potential buy, sell, or watch, as well as a score communicating the stock’s long-term safety. That way, you can beat inflation and reduce risk while managing your own investments.

Tykr has earned 4.9/5-star ratings from Trustpilot and AppSumo. Don’t miss your chance to save for Memorial Day with this sale on a Tykr Stock Screener: Pro Plan Lifetime Subscription for just $99 with code “STOCK” now until June 11th. 

 

Tykr Stock Screener: Pro Plan Lifetime Subscription – $119.99

Prices subject to change.
